info.title: Care Dokter - OpenAPI 3.0
info.description:
This is a sample Care Dokter aplication by Mandaya Group mock up OpenAPI 3.0 specification by Dheo Abdillah as needed for the job application to Mandaya Group

Some useful links:
- [Care Dokter Backend Mockup Repository by Dheo Abdillah](https://github.com/dheoab/care_dokter)
